arts.ttl: PSG 2-0 Seattle Sounders: Player Ratings as PSG Clinch First in Club World Cup Group
arts.sum: After losing 1–0 to Brazil’s Botafogo in their second group match, the UEFA Champions League winners bounced back against the MLS side at Lumen Field in Seattle, beating the Sounders 2–0 with goals from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia and Achraf Hakimi in an otherwise dominant performance. Although the Sounders adjusted and looked to make a late charge, PSG made the most of a counter-attack in the 67th minute, sneaking a long ball past Seattle’s Jackson Ragen for Bradley Barcola to run onto and set Hakimi up for the simple finish.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Seattle Sounders 0-2 PSG: European champions book passage into Round of 16
arts.sum: FIFA Club World Cup, Group Stage, 23/06/25 Paris Saint-Germain booked their spot in the Round of 16 at the FIFA Club World Cup with a comfortable 2-0 victory over Seattle…

arts.ttl: Seattle Sounders vs. PSG: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Despite succumbing to a stunning defeat last time out, Paris Saint-Germain will book their place in the Club World Cup round of 16 with a victory over the Seattle Sounders on Monday. This is the first competitive fixture Seattle Sounders and PSG.
